data.description: Used to provision FGT-VM.  Documentation on using CLI templates can be found at:  https://docs.fortinet.com/document/fortimanager/6.2.0/new-features/623532/zero-touch-provisioning-cli-template-with-variables
data.name: FGT_Provision
data.script:
##Hostname
config system global
    set admintimeout 60
    set hostname FGT-Branch$(base_value)
    set timezone 08
end
##Admin PW
config sys admin
     edit admin
     set password fortinet
end
##Interface config
config system interface
    edit "port1"
        set vdom "root"
        set type physical
        set mode static
        set ip $(mgmt_ip) 255.255.255.0
        set allowaccess ping https ssh http fgfm
        set type physical
    next
    edit "port2"
        set vdom "root"
        set type physical
        set ip 10.1.$(base_value).1 255.255.255.0
        set allowaccess ping https ssh http
        set alias "LAN"
        set device-identification enable
    next
    edit "port3"
        set vdom "root"
        set type physical
        set mode static
        set ip 11.1.1.$(base_value) 255.255.255.255
        set allowaccess ping https ssh
        set alias "WAN1"
        set role wan
    next
    edit "port4"
        set vdom "root"
        set type physical
        set mode static
        set ip 12.1.1.$(base_value) 255.255.255.255
        set allowaccess ping https ssh
        set alias "WAN2"
        set role wan
    next        
    edit "port5"
        set vdom "root"
        set type physical
        set ip 10.88.1.1 255.255.255.0
        set allowaccess ping
        set alias "Guest"
    next
    edit "port6"
        set vdom "root"
        set type physical
   next
    edit "port7"
        set vdom "root"
        set type physical
   next
    edit "port8"
        set vdom "root"
        set type physical
   next
    edit "port9"
        set vdom "root"
        set type physical
   next
    edit "port10"
        set vdom "root"
        set type physical
   next
    edit "HUB1-VPN1"
        set vdom "root"
        set ip 10.10.10.$(base_value) 255.255.255.255
        set allowaccess ping
        set type tunnel
        set remote-ip 10.10.10.253 255.255.255.0
        set interface "port3"
    next
    edit "HUB1-VPN2"
        set vdom "root"
        set ip 10.10.11.$(base_value) 255.255.255.255
        set allowaccess ping
        set type tunnel
        set remote-ip 10.10.11.253 255.255.255.0
        set interface "port4"
    next
    edit "HUB2-VPN1"
        set vdom "root"
        set ip 10.10.12.$(base_value) 255.255.255.255
        set allowaccess ping
        set type tunnel
        set remote-ip 10.10.12.253 255.255.255.0
        set interface "port3"
    next
    edit "HUB2-VPN2"
        set vdom "root"
        set ip 10.10.13.$(base_value) 255.255.255.255
        set allowaccess ping
        set type tunnel
        set remote-ip 10.10.13.253 255.255.255.0
        set interface "port4"
    next
end
##DHCP
config system dhcp server
    edit 0
        set ntp-service local
        set default-gateway 10.1.$(base_value).1
        set netmask 255.255.255.0
        set interface "port2"
        config ip-range
            edit 1
                set start-ip 10.1.$(base_value).100
                set end-ip 10.1.$(base_value).200
            next
        end
    next
    edit 0
        set dns-service default
        set default-gateway 10.88.1.1
        set netmask 255.255.255.0
        set interface "port5"
        config ip-range
            edit 1
                set start-ip 10.88.1.100
                set end-ip 10.88.1.200
            next
        end
        set timezone-option default
    next
end
##VPN Config
config vpn ipsec phase1-interface
    edit "HUB1-VPN1"
        set interface "port3"
        set ike-version 2
        set peertype any
        set net-device enable
        set proposal aes128-sha1
        set add-route disable
        set localid "hub1-vpn1"
        set auto-discovery-receiver enable
        set remote-gw 13.1.1.1
        set psksecret ENC fD3IVwzwTLkGddNB37c5qthJePTjYUJAOik3miZ4/VMOHW5rjLlVj/eFQkORmcTgSvQjPaZvr9GJAxqD4hjb1o+rx5whRMIaSbnVQ9fBCi5UiavlAMpUJjnQTro7pzvIN/q/Zov+xXvPvw5vyz4WKVkg/0/T/eC87km59B77JElfCjBHTqlI3CfDbJursGNVcO774Q==
    next
    edit "HUB1-VPN2"
        set interface "port4"
        set ike-version 2
        set peertype any
        set net-device enable
        set proposal aes128-sha1
        set add-route disable
        set localid "hub1-vpn2"
        set auto-discovery-receiver enable
        set remote-gw 13.1.1.1
        set psksecret ENC N6mwROzCARKdKwxLzNt3M4Y6SRG/DQAKDhxl9O09wW8qO9m51jcI0yttiLXdz6GQ8uDM8NBqx5ftwWPRdaB+0xLylBu5xNwK9Ub2ecULHovYEmtXVKmocqGteT5jExlMx+RIb4UYNa1j+UIgj/aCvLBq0UjAYSQ+8BmUNjBodQiWOj1dNGvNwmQg+QgpTE7FafIrtg==
    next
    edit "HUB2-VPN1"
        set interface "port3"
        set ike-version 2
        set peertype any
        set net-device enable
        set proposal aes128-sha1
        set add-route disable
        set localid "hub2-vpn1"
        set auto-discovery-receiver enable
        set remote-gw 14.1.1.1
        set psksecret ENC 0TzDLBlTZM/0mrOfi6fAjsOuPQCrtPQMXnraw8GJWA9fKLo1kb0kZbJszmRXsmLfzcmN+QsoxW3j+SCOllrYNYxC2VIxfuZJBDaFayOdlQddvt9hYspig+M0uAgkzE+3jYgSHZDHB4hBC/kZnnbi4Je5r4RP+1Gv6kxEPKw3BAyGDoxEOguVRNTuDcPuv0fcRuEG7Q==
    next
    edit "HUB2-VPN2"
        set interface "port4"
        set ike-version 2
        set peertype any
        set net-device enable
        set proposal aes128-sha1
        set add-route disable
        set localid "hub2-vpn2"
        set auto-discovery-receiver enable
        set remote-gw 14.1.1.1
        set psksecret ENC VGLFppeWRhTyQ0kpG9zM8ppNSaTGTmK9FVHs3yZxQJJWTcgNTwF7EspOvmcVtX4DY3D89vYj6icZ65n1+ispP6N/bPwLggXu3KWTAOfCKFjpmvdQAWv8aY/VNuZxVV42VrmeVEQkCBHQYYcNORg/lL7Co+IKXkXD/Pgdaepz5f0SAvcamW9C02VwvivQUrv3TMzqVw==
    next
    edit "Cloud-VPN1"
        set interface "port3"
        set ike-version 2
        set peertype any
        set net-device enable
        set mode-cfg enable
        set proposal aes128-sha1
        set localid "cloud-vpn1"
        set remote-gw 15.1.1.1
        set psksecret ENC aS9uggKJcvxdIoD1gpsovMa6aTCesyF0VezpRCOQE6jVv0BJr4ynLHc81vr3vAC9R6HgB0Eo7TmGyNfFZ3JaNEuq8XgIYFJQKlHyN7bob1c31fN4NB8WoHsu989xbKhO57IuZILuxUILlYlbGEe4jGp8LrBlNNMtGE4Xx3zOwL15IbQZwoq/NZj0KE0vA33sBtiLBA==
    next
    edit "Cloud-VPN2"
        set interface "port4"
        set ike-version 2
        set peertype any
        set net-device enable
        set mode-cfg enable
        set proposal aes128-sha1
        set localid "cloud-vpn2"
        set remote-gw 15.1.1.1
        set psksecret ENC 4RzsOHxY7yrwfrQsozclNj85Ov3W7ATsgBKCGaykoqatKnksyFZYGiIdeU2UucxIKXaJPIQetLlvurXXaTauTvXMVCczj6nKN2DhyZhoV8/ZiLAL+fVELBJw2l0UxPZxWl4V1rpG5i9eiDNgnQGvMMhwdU0dAxqRAGdp3j4PQAxGDzKAHrZbWn8PcWlUoXu1hXPDuA==
    next
end
config vpn ipsec phase2-interface
    edit "HUB1-VPN1"
        set phase1name "HUB1-VPN1"
        set proposal aes128-sha1
        set auto-negotiate enable
    next
    edit "HUB1-VPN2"
        set phase1name "HUB1-VPN2"
        set proposal aes128-sha1
        set auto-negotiate enable
    next
    edit "HUB2-VPN1"
        set phase1name "HUB2-VPN1"
        set proposal aes128-sha1
        set auto-negotiate enable
    next
    edit "HUB2-VPN2"
        set phase1name "HUB2-VPN2"
        set proposal aes128-sha1
        set auto-negotiate enable
    next
    edit "Cloud-VPN1"
        set phase1name "Cloud-VPN1"
        set proposal aes128-sha1
        set auto-negotiate enable
    next
    edit "Cloud-VPN2"
        set phase1name "Cloud-VPN2"
        set proposal aes128-sha1
        set auto-negotiate enable
    next
end
##Static Routes
config router static
    edit 1
        set dst 10.0.0.0 255.0.0.0
        set gateway 192.168.0.254
        set device "port1"
    next
    edit 2
        set gateway 192.168.0.254
        set device "port1"
        set distance 200
    next    
    edit 0
        set device "port3"
        set gateway 11.1.1.100
    next
    edit 0
        set device "port4"
        set gateway 12.1.1.100
    next
    edit 0
        set dst 172.16.0.0 255.240.0.0
        set gateway 192.168.0.254
        set device "port1"
    next
end
##BGP
config router bgp
    set as 65000
    set ibgp-multipath enable
    set network-import-check disable
    config neighbor
        edit "10.10.10.253"
            set link-down-failover enable
            set remote-as 65000
            set connect-timer 10
            set additional-path receive
        next
        edit "10.10.11.253"
            set link-down-failover enable
            set remote-as 65000
            set connect-timer 10
            set additional-path receive
        next
        edit "10.10.12.253"
            set link-down-failover enable
            set remote-as 65000
            set connect-timer 10
            set additional-path receive
        next
        edit "10.10.13.253"
            set link-down-failover enable
            set remote-as 65000
            set connect-timer 10
            set additional-path receive
        next
        edit "10.10.14.253"
            set remote-as 65000
        next
        edit "10.10.15.253"
            set remote-as 65000
        next
    end
    config network
        edit 1
            set prefix 10.1.$(base_value).0 255.255.255.0
        next
    end
end

data.name: FGT_Provision-100E
data.script:
##Hostname
config system global
    set admintimeout 60
    set hostname FGT-Branch$(base_value)
    set timezone 08
end
##Admin PW
config sys admin
     edit admin
     set password fortinet
end
##Interface config
config system interface
    edit "dmz"
        unset ip
    next
    edit "port1"
        set vdom "root"
        set type physical
        set mode static
        set ip $(mgmt_ip) 255.255.255.0
        set allowaccess ping https ssh http fgfm
        set type physical
    next
    edit "port2"
        set vdom "root"
        set type physical
        set ip 10.1.$(base_value).1 255.255.255.0
        set allowaccess ping https ssh http
        set alias "LAN"
        set device-identification enable
    next
    edit "port3"
        set vdom "root"
        set type physical
        set mode static
        set ip 11.1.1.$(base_value) 255.255.255.255
        set allowaccess ping https ssh
        set alias "WAN1"
        set role wan
    next
    edit "port4"
        set vdom "root"
        set type physical
        set mode static
        set ip 12.1.1.$(base_value) 255.255.255.255
        set allowaccess ping https ssh
        set alias "WAN2"
        set role wan
    next        
    edit "port5"
        set vdom "root"
        set type physical
        set ip 10.88.1.1 255.255.255.0
        set allowaccess ping
        set alias "Guest"
    next
    edit "port6"
        set vdom "root"
        set type physical
   next
    edit "port7"
        set vdom "root"
        set type physical
   next
    edit "port8"
        set vdom "root"
        set type physical
   next
    edit "port9"
        set vdom "root"
        set type physical
   next
    edit "port10"
        set vdom "root"
        set type physical
   next
    edit "HUB1-VPN1"
        set vdom "root"
        set ip 10.10.10.$(base_value) 255.255.255.255
        set allowaccess ping
        set type tunnel
        set remote-ip 10.10.10.253 255.255.255.0
        set interface "port3"
    next
    edit "HUB1-VPN2"
        set vdom "root"
        set ip 10.10.11.$(base_value) 255.255.255.255
        set allowaccess ping
        set type tunnel
        set remote-ip 10.10.11.253 255.255.255.0
        set interface "port4"
    next
    edit "HUB2-VPN1"
        set vdom "root"
        set ip 10.10.12.$(base_value) 255.255.255.255
        set allowaccess ping
        set type tunnel
        set remote-ip 10.10.12.253 255.255.255.0
        set interface "port3"
    next
    edit "HUB2-VPN2"
        set vdom "root"
        set ip 10.10.13.$(base_value) 255.255.255.255
        set allowaccess ping
        set type tunnel
        set remote-ip 10.10.13.253 255.255.255.0
        set interface "port4"
    next
end
##DHCP
config system dhcp server
    edit 0
        set ntp-service local
        set default-gateway 10.1.$(base_value).1
        set netmask 255.255.255.0
        set interface "port2"
        config ip-range
            edit 1
                set start-ip 10.1.$(base_value).100
                set end-ip 10.1.$(base_value).200
            next
        end
    next
    edit 0
        set dns-service default
        set default-gateway 10.88.1.1
        set netmask 255.255.255.0
        set interface "port5"
        config ip-range
            edit 1
                set start-ip 10.88.1.100
                set end-ip 10.88.1.200
            next
        end
        set timezone-option default
    next
end
##VPN Config
config vpn ipsec phase1-interface
    edit "HUB1-VPN1"
        set interface "port3"
        set ike-version 2
        set peertype any
        set net-device enable
        set proposal aes128-sha1
        set add-route disable
        set localid "hub1-vpn1"
        set auto-discovery-receiver enable
        set remote-gw 13.1.1.1
        set psksecret ENC fD3IVwzwTLkGddNB37c5qthJePTjYUJAOik3miZ4/VMOHW5rjLlVj/eFQkORmcTgSvQjPaZvr9GJAxqD4hjb1o+rx5whRMIaSbnVQ9fBCi5UiavlAMpUJjnQTro7pzvIN/q/Zov+xXvPvw5vyz4WKVkg/0/T/eC87km59B77JElfCjBHTqlI3CfDbJursGNVcO774Q==
    next
    edit "HUB1-VPN2"
        set interface "port4"
        set ike-version 2
        set peertype any
        set net-device enable
        set proposal aes128-sha1
        set add-route disable
        set localid "hub1-vpn2"
        set auto-discovery-receiver enable
        set remote-gw 13.1.1.1
        set psksecret ENC N6mwROzCARKdKwxLzNt3M4Y6SRG/DQAKDhxl9O09wW8qO9m51jcI0yttiLXdz6GQ8uDM8NBqx5ftwWPRdaB+0xLylBu5xNwK9Ub2ecULHovYEmtXVKmocqGteT5jExlMx+RIb4UYNa1j+UIgj/aCvLBq0UjAYSQ+8BmUNjBodQiWOj1dNGvNwmQg+QgpTE7FafIrtg==
    next
    edit "HUB2-VPN1"
        set interface "port3"
        set ike-version 2
        set peertype any
        set net-device enable
        set proposal aes128-sha1
        set add-route disable
        set localid "hub2-vpn1"
        set auto-discovery-receiver enable
        set remote-gw 14.1.1.1
        set psksecret ENC 0TzDLBlTZM/0mrOfi6fAjsOuPQCrtPQMXnraw8GJWA9fKLo1kb0kZbJszmRXsmLfzcmN+QsoxW3j+SCOllrYNYxC2VIxfuZJBDaFayOdlQddvt9hYspig+M0uAgkzE+3jYgSHZDHB4hBC/kZnnbi4Je5r4RP+1Gv6kxEPKw3BAyGDoxEOguVRNTuDcPuv0fcRuEG7Q==
    next
    edit "HUB2-VPN2"
        set interface "port4"
        set ike-version 2
        set peertype any
        set net-device enable
        set proposal aes128-sha1
        set add-route disable
        set localid "hub2-vpn2"
        set auto-discovery-receiver enable
        set remote-gw 14.1.1.1
        set psksecret ENC VGLFppeWRhTyQ0kpG9zM8ppNSaTGTmK9FVHs3yZxQJJWTcgNTwF7EspOvmcVtX4DY3D89vYj6icZ65n1+ispP6N/bPwLggXu3KWTAOfCKFjpmvdQAWv8aY/VNuZxVV42VrmeVEQkCBHQYYcNORg/lL7Co+IKXkXD/Pgdaepz5f0SAvcamW9C02VwvivQUrv3TMzqVw==
    next
    edit "Cloud-VPN1"
        set interface "port3"
        set ike-version 2
        set peertype any
        set net-device enable
        set mode-cfg enable
        set proposal aes128-sha1
        set localid "cloud-vpn1"
        set remote-gw 15.1.1.1
        set psksecret ENC aS9uggKJcvxdIoD1gpsovMa6aTCesyF0VezpRCOQE6jVv0BJr4ynLHc81vr3vAC9R6HgB0Eo7TmGyNfFZ3JaNEuq8XgIYFJQKlHyN7bob1c31fN4NB8WoHsu989xbKhO57IuZILuxUILlYlbGEe4jGp8LrBlNNMtGE4Xx3zOwL15IbQZwoq/NZj0KE0vA33sBtiLBA==
    next
    edit "Cloud-VPN2"
        set interface "port4"
        set ike-version 2
        set peertype any
        set net-device enable
        set mode-cfg enable
        set proposal aes128-sha1
        set localid "cloud-vpn2"
        set remote-gw 15.1.1.1
        set psksecret ENC 4RzsOHxY7yrwfrQsozclNj85Ov3W7ATsgBKCGaykoqatKnksyFZYGiIdeU2UucxIKXaJPIQetLlvurXXaTauTvXMVCczj6nKN2DhyZhoV8/ZiLAL+fVELBJw2l0UxPZxWl4V1rpG5i9eiDNgnQGvMMhwdU0dAxqRAGdp3j4PQAxGDzKAHrZbWn8PcWlUoXu1hXPDuA==
    next
end
config vpn ipsec phase2-interface
    edit "HUB1-VPN1"
        set phase1name "HUB1-VPN1"
        set proposal aes128-sha1
        set auto-negotiate enable
    next
    edit "HUB1-VPN2"
        set phase1name "HUB1-VPN2"
        set proposal aes128-sha1
        set auto-negotiate enable
    next
    edit "HUB2-VPN1"
        set phase1name "HUB2-VPN1"
        set proposal aes128-sha1
        set auto-negotiate enable
    next
    edit "HUB2-VPN2"
        set phase1name "HUB2-VPN2"
        set proposal aes128-sha1
        set auto-negotiate enable
    next
    edit "Cloud-VPN1"
        set phase1name "Cloud-VPN1"
        set proposal aes128-sha1
        set auto-negotiate enable
    next
    edit "Cloud-VPN2"
        set phase1name "Cloud-VPN2"
        set proposal aes128-sha1
        set auto-negotiate enable
    next
end
##Static Routes
config router static
    edit 1
        set dst 10.0.0.0 255.0.0.0
        set gateway 192.168.0.254
        set device "port1"
    next
    edit 2
        set gateway 192.168.0.254
        set device "port1"
        set distance 200
    next    
    edit 0
        set device "port3"
        set gateway 11.1.1.100
    next
    edit 0
        set device "port4"
        set gateway 12.1.1.100
    next
    edit 0
        set dst 172.16.0.0 255.240.0.0
        set gateway 192.168.0.254
        set device "port1"
    next
end
##BGP
config router bgp
    set as 65000
    set ibgp-multipath enable
    set network-import-check disable
    config neighbor
        edit "10.10.10.253"
            set link-down-failover enable
            set remote-as 65000
            set connect-timer 10
            set additional-path receive
        next
        edit "10.10.11.253"
            set link-down-failover enable
            set remote-as 65000
            set connect-timer 10
            set additional-path receive
        next
        edit "10.10.12.253"
            set link-down-failover enable
            set remote-as 65000
            set connect-timer 10
            set additional-path receive
        next
        edit "10.10.13.253"
            set link-down-failover enable
            set remote-as 65000
            set connect-timer 10
            set additional-path receive
        next
        edit "10.10.14.253"
            set remote-as 65000
        next
        edit "10.10.15.253"
            set remote-as 65000
        next
    end
    config network
        edit 1
            set prefix 10.1.$(base_value).0 255.255.255.0
        next
    end
end

data.description: used to overwrite OpeningHours Schedule per device from Policy Package
data.name: Set_Schedule
data.script:
config firewall schedule recurring
    edit "OpeningHours"
        set start $(opentime)
        set end $(closetime)
        set day monday tuesday wednesday thursday friday
    next
end

data.comment: Mapping for VPN1 on either hub.
data.name: HUB-VPN1

data.comment: Mapping for VPN2 on either hub.
data.name: HUB-VPN2

data.comment: Mapping for HUB1-VPN1 on the branch.
data.name: HUB1-VPN1

data.comment: Mapping for HUB1-VPN2 on the branch.
data.name: HUB1-VPN2

data.comment: Mapping for HUB2-VPN1 on the branch.
data.name: HUB2-VPN1

data.comment: Mapping for HUB2-VPN2 on the branch.
data.name: HUB2-VPN2
